le want to develop clients and
>> services in parallel, shich rules out cli=
ent design by inspecting the
>> runtime behavior of a service.

er this being mentioned by you earlier on. Should be easily

etting up a mock of the server services? It would be the

AP webservice - you couldn't build the client before

you could mock the server somehow.

Hmm, no. You build clients based on t=
he definition of the kind of  
service. With SOAP that would be WSDL and wi=
th e.g. AtomPub it is the  
RFC 5023. Building clients for individual servi=
ces makes no sense.
